thread.title: Win Ashes tickets with Specsavers: Telegraph Umpire Challenge - Terms and Conditions
thread.title_full: Win Ashes tickets with Specsavers: Telegraph Umpire Challenge - Terms and Conditions - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Ashes tickets with Specsavers: Telegraph Umpire Challenge - Terms and Conditions
text: Specsavers – Prize Draw Terms and Conditions Telegraph Umpire Challenge Game in association with Specsavers Prize Draws Terms and Conditions 1. These prize draws are open to residents of the UK, Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland aged 18 years or over. Employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and Specsavers Optical Group Limited (“Specsavers”), their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw are not eligible to enter. 2. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. 3. Entrants to each prize draw must visit telegraph.co.uk/specsavers and complete the Telegraph Umpire Challenge Game. Entrants scoring six correct decisions out of six will be invited to submit their entry by completing the entry form. Entry to each prize draw is restricted to one per person. Unsuccessful entries in each draw will be rolled over into the following draw. For the avoidance of doubt, this means that a participant may have up to four entries in the final draw. Entries cannot be amended in any way after submission. 4. The decision in each Telegraph Umpire Challenge Game in/out scenario has been made by two independent ECB registered cricket umpires and their decisions are final. No correspondence over their decisions will be entered into. 5. The same entrant cannot be a winner in more than one of the prize draws. Where a winning entrant is chosen as a winner in a subsequent draw, that winner will not be able to claim the prize and an alternative winner will be drawn in accordance with these Terms and Conditions. 6. Entries to each of four prize draws may be submitted during the following time periods: • Draw 1: 2nd Investec Ashes Test Match at Lords, (July 16-20) 00:01, July 3 to 09:00, July 13; • Draw 2: 3rd Investec Ashes Test Match at Edgbaston (July 29 – August 2) 09:01, July 13 to 09:00, July 27; • Draw 3: 4th Investec Ashes Test Match at Trent Bridge (August 6 – 10) 09:01, July 27 to 09:00 August 3; • Draw 4: 5th Investec Ashes Test Match at The Oval (August 20 – 24) 09:01, August 3 to 09:00, August 17, 2015 7. Late entries for a draw will not be entered into that draw but will be entered into the subsequent draws. Late entries for Draw 4 will not be accepted. Entries that are illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of submission of an entry will not be accepted as proof of receipt. 8. The winners for each draw will be the first three eligible entries drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date for that draw. An up to date list of the winners’ names and counties can be obtained by sending a stamped, addressed envelope to Telegraph Umpire Challenge Prize Draws Winners, SPARK, Telegraph Media Group, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT before September 17, 2015. 9. The Promoter will contact the winners of each draw by telephone by 13:00 on the closing date of the prize draw in which they are a winner. Should the Promoter be unable to contact a winner or if a winner is unable to accept their prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award that prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these Terms and Conditions. 10. The prizes as described are available on the date of publication. Should a prize become unavailable, a substitute prize of equal value shall be provided. 11. Each prize draw will have three winners. The prizes are as follow: • Draw 1: 2nd Investec Ashes Test Match at Lords, (July 16-20) Two pairs of tickets to Day 2, One pair of tickets to Day 3; • Draw 2: 3rd Investec Ashes Test Match at Edgbaston (July 29 – August 2) Two pairs of tickets to Day 2, One pair of tickets to Day 3; • Draw 3: 4th Investec Ashes Test Match at Trent Bridge (August 6 – 10) Two pairs of tickets to Day 2, One pair of tickets to Day 3; • Draw 4: 5th Investec Ashes Test Match at The Oval (August 20 – 24) Two pairs of tickets to Day 2, One pair of tickets to Day 3. 12. The prizes in each draw will be allocated to the winners of that draw at random by the Promoter and no negotiation or correspondence over allocation will be entered into. The winners must collect their tickets from the ticket collection point at the respective Test venue, where winners will be required to produce photo ID in order to claim their prize 13. The prizes do not include travel to or from the event, accommodation, food and drink, personal expenditure or incidental costs. 14. All prizes are subject to availability, non-transferable and there are no cash alternatives. 15. The winners may be required to participate in reasonable publicity on behalf of Specsavers and the Promoter. 16. Entrants’ data will be used for the purpose of administration of this prize draw and in accordance with the permissions granted or withheld at the point of entry. 17. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prizes impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter and/or Specsavers. Accordingly the Promoter and/or Specsavers may at its absolute discretion vary or amend the promotion and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter and/or Specsavers as a result thereof. 18. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prizes is the responsibility of Specsavers Optical Group Limited. 19. These Terms and Conditions are to be interpreted in accordance with English law and any dispute arising out of these Terms or their subject matter is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT.
